maharagama pilika rohala awata padinchikaruwanta pilika rogaya walandi athnam eeta hethuwa wikirana drawya parisarayata ekwa thibimadayi soya balimata widwath kamituwak path kirimata saukhya amathyanshaya thiranaya kara thibe.basnahira palath sabha amathi udaya gammanpila mahatha pramukha kandayamak wisin thamata bharadun samikshana warthawa sambandhayen dadi awadhanayak yomu karana bawath idiriyedi path kerena ema kamituwa haraha sthira nigamanayakata elambai nisi kriya marga ganna bawath saukhya amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha pawasayi.udgatha gataluwa sambandhayen amathi gammanpila mahatha thama danuwath kirimath samanga rohale niladharinta upades laba dun bawada pilika rohalen bahara karana apadrawya mahajana saukhyata hani nowana paridi aarakshithawa bahara kirimatath wadi duratath rohal baladharinta upades di thibe.

makswadayata ha bhauthikawadayatama wikalpa lesa mema pashchathnuthanawadi sankalpa ismathu wu aakaraya pilibandawa loka samajawadi web adawiye sabhapathi ndewing north siya frankfart guru kulaya: pashchathnuthanawadaya ha wyaja wame deshapalanaya kruthiya thula mese pawasayi: “wyaja wame” deshapalanaya lesa apa dan athishaya niwaradi lesa handunwana boho deshapalana themawan 1950 ganan ha 1960 gananwaladi pablowadaye ha sulu dhaneshwara wame watapitawa thulin pana naguna pudgala ananyathawaya ha jiwanacharyawa madi karagaththawu eewaya.
